verses.verse: Jehovah <WH3068> reigneth<WH4427>; Let the earth<WH776> rejoice<WH1523>; Let the multitude<WH7227> of isles<WH339> be glad<WH8055>.
Clouds <WH6051> and darkness<WH6205> are round about<WH5439> him<WH6664>: Righteousness and justice<WH4941> are the foundation<WH4349> of his throne<WH3678>.
A fire<WH784> goeth<WH3212> before<WH6440> him<WH3857>, And burneth up his adversaries<WH6862> round about<WH5439>.
His lightnings<WH1300> lightened<WH215> the world<WH8398>: The earth<WH776> saw<WH7200>, and trembled<WH2342>.
The mountains<WH2022> melted<WH4549> like wax<WH1749> at the presence<WH6440> of Jehovah<WH3068>, At the presence<WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068> of the whole earth<WH776>.
The heavens<WH8064> declare<WH5046> his righteousness<WH6664>, And all the peoples<WH5971> have seen<WH7200> his glory<WH3519>.
Let all them be put to shame<WH954> that serve<WH5647> graven images<WH6459>, That boast<WH1984> themselves of idols<WH457>: Worship<WH7812> him<WH430>, all ye gods.
Zion <WH6726> heard<WH8085> and was glad<WH8055>, And the daughters<WH1323> of Judah<WH3063> rejoiced<WH1523>, Because of thy judgments<WH4941>, O Jehovah<WH3068>.
For thou<WH3068>, Jehovah, art most high above<WH5945> all the earth<WH776>: Thou art exalted<WH5927> far above<WH3966> all gods<WH430>.

O ye that love<WH157> Jehovah<WH3068>, hate<WH8130> evil<WH7451>: He preserveth<WH8104> the souls<WH5315> of his saints<WH2623>; He delivereth<WH5337> them out of the hand<WH3027> of the wicked<WH7563>.
Light <WH216> is sown<WH2232> for the righteous<WH6662>, And gladness<WH8057> for the upright<WH3477> in heart<WH3820>.
Be glad<WH8055> in Jehovah<WH3068>, ye righteous<WH6662>; And give thanks<WH3034> to his holy<WH6944> memorial name<WH2143>.
